replies.bodyText: Combining here since @markxnelson made the same comment below... Checking that the operator doesn't restart pods is a bit tricky.  The operator will respond very quickly to check all existing domains after it starts, so if the operator hasn't started the deletion of any pods within a few seconds then it isn't rolling the servers.  You can check if pods are in the process of being deleted by checking the .metadata.deletionTimestamp.
